Sioux_Falls.KXRB (AM):
KXRB (1140 AM) is a radio station in Sioux Falls, South Dakota airing a classic country format. The station is owned by Townsquare Media.
The programming on what was then KSOO was previously a mix of local talk shows, including "Viewpoint University", "McDaniel's Mess", and "The Mainstreet Cafe", which focused on the current events of the Sioux Falls area and South Dakota.
